alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 08 at 11:23AM EST until January 12 at 3:24PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Columbia SC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Lexington and Calhoun Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Richland and Calhoun Counties. Pee Dee River At Cheraw affecting Chesterfield and Marlboro Counties. Enoree River At Whitmire affecting Union and Newberry Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pee Dee River at Cheraw. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, River bottomland downstream from cheraw will begin to flood. At 30.0 feet, The higher bank begins to flood. Large areas of farmland and river bottomland near Cheraw will be flooded. Portions of Riverside Park become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage by late Thursday morning to 30.2 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Flooded roadways are nearly impossible to see at night. Avoid traveling in this area. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1130 AM EST.
